QuestData.Title: Unmasked
QuestData.Description:
Thanks to your efforts, the shield that protects our prey has been made brittle as a dried leaf.
Our hunt is all but complete.
Come, let us put an end to the vile Gorak Zhar.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: It's time to end the Drust threat to Ardenweald.
QuestData.RewardText:
Oh, Ara'lon... even after all he endured, he found a way to smile again... only to...
<Lady Moonberry wipes her eyes.>
There will be time for tears later. We still need to stop the Drust. For Ara'lon... and the forest he fought to protect.
